meanings.sent1: The aimlessness of the lost puppy was evident as it wandered around the park.
meanings.sent2: She felt overwhelmed by the aimlessness of her days after retiring.
meanings.sent3: The aimlessness of the chicken crossing the road left everyone wondering what it was up to.
meanings.sent4: The aimlessness of the wind blowing through the empty streets mirrored his own sense of confusion.
meanings.sent5: The aimlessness of the ship lost at sea was a haunting reminder of the dangers of being adrift.

meanings.definition: Without a specific goal or objective.
meanings.sent1: His aimlessness in choosing a career path worried his parents.
meanings.sent2: The aimlessness of the project made it difficult to see any progress.
meanings.sent3: The aimlessness of the cat's play with the yarn amused the children for hours.
meanings.sent4: The aimlessness of the clouds drifting lazily across the sky matched his relaxed mood.
meanings.sent5: The aimlessness of the car driving around aimlessly confused the other drivers on the road.
